p: The NDVI was derived using Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR) images covering latitude 36째 to 43째 north and longitude 113째 to 120째 east. Annual NDVI from 1999 to 2011 were calculated using remote sensor monitoring systems of meteorological satellite V1.0, which was developed by the Institute of Meteorological Sciences of Hebei province. The annual NDVI of cities in Hebei province was calculated using an electronic map scale of 1:250000.
